silo is assigned a unique ID. ERC-721 token is minted with identical ID to deployer. An owner of that token receives the deployer fees.","returns":{"siloId":"The ID of the silo"}},"accrueInterestForSilo(address)":{"params":{"_silo":"silo for which accrue interest"}},"borrowerCollateralSilo(address)":{"details":"As a user can deposit into `Silo0` and `Silo1`, this property specifies which Silo will be used as collateral for the debt. Later on, it will be used for max LTV and solvency checks. After being set, the collateral silo is never set to `address(0)` again but such getters as `getConfigsForSolvency`, `getConfigsForBorrow`, `getConfigsForWithdraw` will return empty collateral silo config if borrower doesn't have debt. In the SiloConfig collateral silo is set by the following functions: `onDebtTransfer` - only if the recipient doesn't have collateral silo set (inherits it from the sender) This function is called on debt share token transfer (debt transfer). `setOtherSiloAsCollateralSilo` - sets the opposite silo as collateral from the one that calls the function. In the Silo collateral silo is set by the following functions: `borrow` - always sets opposite silo as collateral. If Silo0 borrows, then Silo1 will be collateral and vice versa.","params":{"_borrower":"The address of the borrower for which the collateral silo is being retrieved"},"returns":{"collateralSilo":"The address of the collateral silo for the specified borrower"}},"getAssetForSilo(address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input","params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which the associated asset is being retrieved"},"returns":{"asset":"The address of the asset associated with the specified silo"}},"getCollateralShareTokenAndAsset(address,uint8)":{"params":{"_collateralType":"The type of collateral","_silo":"The address of the silo for which the share token and silo token are being retrieved"},"returns":{"asset":"The address of the silo token","shareToken":"The address of the share token (collateral or protected collateral)"}},"getConfig(address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.","params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved"},"returns":{"config":"The configuration data for the specified silo"}},"getConfigsForBorrow(address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.","params":{"_debtSilo":"The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved"},"returns":{"collateralConfig":"The configuration data for the collateral silo (always other than `_debtSilo`)","debtConfig":"The configuration data for the debt silo (always config for `_debtSilo`)"}},"getConfigsForSolvency(address)":{"params":{"borrower":"borrower address for which debtConfig will be returned"},"returns":{"collateralConfig":"The configuration data for collateral silo (empty if there is no debt).","debtConfig":"The configuration data for debt silo (empty if there is no debt)."}},"getConfigsForWithdraw(address,address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.","params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved"},"returns":{"collateralConfig":"The configuration data for the collateral silo (empty if there is no debt)","debtConfig":"The configuration data for the debt silo (empty if there is no debt)","depositConfig":"The configuration data for the specified silo (always config for `_silo`)"}},"getDebtShareTokenAndAsset(address)":{"params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which the share token and silo token are being retrieved"},"returns":{"asset":"The address of the silo token","shareToken":"The address of the share token (debt)"}},"getDebtSilo(address)":{"details":"This function reverts if debt present in two silo (should not happen)","params":{"_borrower":"The address of the borrower for which the debt silo is being retrieved"}},"getFeesWithAsset(address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input","params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which fee-related information is being retrieved."},"returns":{"asset":"The address of the asset associated with the specified silo.","daoFee":"The DAO fee percentage in 18 decimals points.","deployerFee":"The deployer fee percentage in 18 decimals points.","flashloanFee":"The flashloan fee percentage in 18 decimals points."}},"getShareTokens(address)":{"details":"This function reverts for incorrect silo address input","params":{"_silo":"The address of the silo for which share tokens are being retrieved"},"returns":{"collateralShareToken":"The address of the collateral share token","debtShareToken":"The address of the debt share token","protectedShareToken":"The address of the protected (non-borrowable) share token"}},"getSilos()":{"returns":{"silo0":"The address of the first silo","silo1":"The address of the second silo"}},"hasDebtInOtherSilo(address,address)":{"params":{"_borrower":"The address of the borrower for which the debt is checked","_thisSilo":"The address of the silo in respect of which the debt is checked"},"returns":{"hasDebt":"true if the borrower has debt in other silo"}},"onDebtTransfer(address,address)":{"details":"It should be called on debt transfer (debt share token transfer). In the case if the`_recipient` doesn't have configured a collateral silo, it will be set to the collateral silo of the `_sender`.","params":{"_recipient":"recipient address","_sender":"sender address"}},"reentrancyGuardEntered()":{"returns":{"entered":"true if the reentrancy guard is currently set to \"entered\", which indicates there is a `nonReentrant` function in the call stack."}},"setOtherSiloAsCollateralSilo(address)":{"details":"Revert if msg.sender is not a SILO_0 or SILO_1.Always set collateral silo opposite to the msg.sender.","params":{"_borrower":"borrower address"},"returns":{"collateralSiloChanged":"TRUE if collateral silo changed"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"SILO_ID()":{"notice":"Retrieves the silo ID"},"accrueInterestForBothSilos()":{"notice":"Accrue interest for both silos (SILO_0 and SILO_1 in a config)"},"accrueInterestForSilo(address)":{"notice":"Accrue interest for the silo"},"borrowerCollateralSilo(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the collateral silo for a specific borrower."},"getAssetForSilo(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the asset associated with a specific silo"},"getCollateralShareTokenAndAsset(address,uint8)":{"notice":"Retrieves the share token and the silo token associated with a specific silo"},"getConfig(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo"},"getConfigsForBorrow(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo for borrow fn."},"getConfigsForSolvency(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves configuration data for both silos. First config is for the silo that is asking for configs."},"getConfigsForWithdraw(address,address)":{"notice":"Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo for withdraw fn."},"getDebtShareTokenAndAsset(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the share token and the silo token associated with a specific silo"},"getDebtSilo(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the debt silo associated with a specific borrower"},"getFeesWithAsset(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves fee-related information for a specific silo"},"getShareTokens(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves share tokens associated with a specific silo"},"getSilos()":{"notice":"Retrieves the addresses of the two silos"},"hasDebtInOtherSilo(address,address)":{"notice":"Verifies if the borrower has debt in other silo by checking the debt share token balance"},"reentrancyGuardEntered()":{"notice":"view method for checking cross Silo reentrancy flag"},"setOtherSiloAsCollateralSilo(address)":{"notice":"Set collateral silo"},"setThisSiloAsCollateralSilo(address)":{"notice":"deprecated"},"turnOffReentrancyProtection()":{"notice":"only silo method for cross Silo reentrancy"},"turnOnReentrancyProtection()":{"notice":"only silo method for cross Silo "silo-core/contracts/interfaces/ISiloFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaaef1f031dfe3bbea9cdc471c77e06a8bc61619c6c2f436da7fbe530b5827dca","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://206ad1673641e716376f655cd2be10b3f9969c76d3c76540114639098d758c67","dweb:/ipfs/QmPi8fBvJ44LrZNn2aGKYfGVtyU8WaidxpSUzBt5zjQqHv"]}},"version":1}

SILO_ID().details: Each silo is assigned a unique ID. ERC-721 token is minted with identical ID to deployer. An owner of that token receives the deployer fees.

borrowerCollateralSilo(address).details: As a user can deposit into `Silo0` and `Silo1`, this property specifies which Silo will be used as collateral for the debt. Later on, it will be used for max LTV and solvency checks. After being set, the collateral silo is never set to `address(0)` again but such getters as `getConfigsForSolvency`, `getConfigsForBorrow`, `getConfigsForWithdraw` will return empty collateral silo config if borrower doesn't have debt. In the SiloConfig collateral silo is set by the following functions: `onDebtTransfer` - only if the recipient doesn't have collateral silo set (inherits it from the sender) This function is called on debt share token transfer (debt transfer). `setOtherSiloAsCollateralSilo` - sets the opposite silo as collateral from the one that calls the function. In the Silo collateral silo is set by the following functions: `borrow` - always sets opposite silo as collateral. If Silo0 borrows, then Silo1 will be collateral and vice versa.

params._borrower: The address of the borrower for which the collateral silo is being retrieved

returns.collateralSilo: The address of the collateral silo for the specified borrower

getAssetForSilo(address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input

params._silo: The address of the silo for which the associated asset is being retrieved

returns.asset: The address of the asset associated with the specified silo

params._silo: The address of the silo for which the share token and silo token are being retrieved

returns.asset: The address of the silo token
returns.shareToken: The address of the share token (collateral or protected collateral)

getConfig(address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.

params._silo: The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved

returns.config: The configuration data for the specified silo

getConfigsForBorrow(address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.

params._debtSilo: The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved

returns.collateralConfig: The configuration data for the collateral silo (always other than `_debtSilo`)
returns.debtConfig: The configuration data for the debt silo (always config for `_debtSilo`)

params.borrower: borrower address for which debtConfig will be returned

returns.collateralConfig: The configuration data for collateral silo (empty if there is no debt).
returns.debtConfig: The configuration data for debt silo (empty if there is no debt).

getConfigsForWithdraw(address,address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input.

params._silo: The address of the silo for which configuration data is being retrieved

returns.collateralConfig: The configuration data for the collateral silo (empty if there is no debt)
returns.debtConfig: The configuration data for the debt silo (empty if there is no debt)
returns.depositConfig: The configuration data for the specified silo (always config for `_silo`)

params._silo: The address of the silo for which the share token and silo token are being retrieved

returns.asset: The address of the silo token
returns.shareToken: The address of the share token (debt)

getDebtSilo(address).details: This function reverts if debt present in two silo (should not happen)

params._borrower: The address of the borrower for which the debt silo is being retrieved

getFeesWithAsset(address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input

params._silo: The address of the silo for which fee-related information is being retrieved.

returns.asset: The address of the asset associated with the specified silo.
returns.daoFee: The DAO fee percentage in 18 decimals points.
returns.deployerFee: The deployer fee percentage in 18 decimals points.
returns.flashloanFee: The flashloan fee percentage in 18 decimals points.

getShareTokens(address).details: This function reverts for incorrect silo address input

params._silo: The address of the silo for which share tokens are being retrieved

returns.collateralShareToken: The address of the collateral share token
returns.debtShareToken: The address of the debt share token
returns.protectedShareToken: The address of the protected (non-borrowable) share token

returns.silo0: The address of the first silo
returns.silo1: The address of the second silo

params._borrower: The address of the borrower for which the debt is checked
params._thisSilo: The address of the silo in respect of which the debt is checked

returns.hasDebt: true if the borrower has debt in other silo

onDebtTransfer(address,address).details: It should be called on debt transfer (debt share token transfer). In the case if the`_recipient` doesn't have configured a collateral silo, it will be set to the collateral silo of the `_sender`.

returns.entered: true if the reentrancy guard is currently set to "entered", which indicates there is a `nonReentrant` function in the call stack.

setOtherSiloAsCollateralSilo(address).details: Revert if msg.sender is not a SILO_0 or SILO_1.Always set collateral silo opposite to the msg.sender.

accrueInterestForBothSilos().notice: Accrue interest for both silos (SILO_0 and SILO_1 in a config)

borrowerCollateralSilo(address).notice: Retrieves the collateral silo for a specific borrower.

getAssetForSilo(address).notice: Retrieves the asset associated with a specific silo

getCollateralShareTokenAndAsset(address,.notice: Retrieves the share token and the silo token associated with a specific silo

getConfig(address).notice: Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo

getConfigsForBorrow(address).notice: Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo for borrow fn.

getConfigsForSolvency(address).notice: Retrieves configuration data for both silos. First config is for the silo that is asking for configs.

getConfigsForWithdraw(address,address).notice: Retrieves configuration data for a specific silo for withdraw fn.

getDebtShareTokenAndAsset(address).notice: Retrieves the share token and the silo token associated with a specific silo

getDebtSilo(address).notice: Retrieves the debt silo associated with a specific borrower

getFeesWithAsset(address).notice: Retrieves fee-related information for a specific silo

getShareTokens(address).notice: Retrieves share tokens associated with a specific silo

getSilos().notice: Retrieves the addresses of the two silos

hasDebtInOtherSilo(address,address).notice: Verifies if the borrower has debt in other silo by checking the debt share token balance

reentrancyGuardEntered().notice: view method for checking cross Silo reentrancy flag

turnOffReentrancyProtection().notice: only silo method for cross Silo reentrancy

turnOnReentrancyProtection().notice: only silo method for cross Silo reentrancy
